sentences.en: They are hoping to retrace the epic voyage of Christopher Columbus.
sentences.cn: 他们期待着沿哥伦布的壮丽航程进行一次航行。

sentences.en: She turned around and began to retrace her steps towards the house.
sentences.cn: 她转身沿原路向那栋房子走去。

sentences.en: Detectives are trying to retrace her movements on the night she disappeared.
sentences.cn: 侦探试图查出她失踪当晚的行踪。
